title: 2022's Fiercest Women in Life Sciences
author: Andrea Park
description: If ever there were a time that demanded a reminder of the power of women, it's now. 2022 has seen women in the U.S. lose previously guaranteed rights to bodily autonomy—sparking uprisings across the nation—while their Iranian counterparts have taken to the streets to secure those same freedoms, at great risk to their lives. Though undoubtedly a fraught time in the history of the women's movement, it's also an inspiring one, as people from every corner of the globe come together in support of the idea that women deserve equal rights. | 2022 is undoubtedly a fraught time in the history of the women's movement, but it is also an inspiring one, as people from every corner of the globe come together in support of the idea that women deserve equal rights. That double-edged sentiment echoes throughout this year's list of the 20 fiercest women in life sciences.
